akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 109–58, title I, § 101(c), Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 606

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1815. Repealed. Pub. L. 109–58, title I, § 101(c), Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 606
Section, Pub. L. 105–275, title III, § 310, Oct. 21, 1998, 112 Stat. 2456, related to energy conservation and management.
Editorial Notes Codification Section was classified to section 166i of former Title 40, prior to the enactment of Title 40, Public Buildings, Property, and Works, by Pub. L. 107–217, § 1, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1062.
